data.title: 2004 NBA Playoffs: Total Assists Leaders
meta_keywords: nba 2003 2004 04 Playoffs stats leaders players total assists
data.meta_description: Information about which players led the NBA with more total assists in the 2004 Playoffs, including leaders, average, totals and games played.
data.text:
Who had the most total assists in the 2004 Playoffs?

Playing for the Detroit Pistons, Chauncey Billups led the NBA with a total of 136 assists in 23 games.
